channel.title: Welcome on Shreya Sathyanarayanan
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Shreya Sathyanarayanan

item.title: Research
item.description:
My research focuses on HCI, HAI, and Social Computing. I am currently exploring the area of computational tools for thought and AI-powered systems for collaborative spaces. I have previously worked on projects about creative writing and AI, collaborative practices in online communities, and designing and developing productivity tools to support asynchronous and synchronous collaboration.

Publications

From Pen to Prompt: How Creative Writers Integrate AI Into their Writing Practice – Creativity & Cognition 2025
